info.name: Ko-inari
info.description: Ko-inari familiar from Ryoko's Guide to the Yokai Realms

element.name: Ko-inari
element.source: Ryoko's Guide to the Yokai Realms

description.p: Armor Class 12
Hit Points 3 (1d4 + 1)
Speed 30 ft.
Damage Immunities radiant
Senses darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 12
Languages Common, Celestial, Kitsune

Divine Reproach. When a koinari witnesses one of its allies commit an evil deed, it takes the earliest possible opportunity to scold them (typically waiting until a combat concludes). The koinari’s scolding takes 1 minute and requires the koinari to be within 10 feet of its ally for the duration, after which the ally must succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw or take 4 (1d8) psychic damage. Once a creature has failed this saving throw, it can’t be affected by this trait again until it finishes a long rest.
Fortified Mind. The koinari is immune to magic that allows other creatures to read its thoughts, determine whether it’s lying, know its alignment, or know its creature type.

Radiant Strike.
Melee or Ranged Spell Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) radiant damage.

sheet.description: Ko-inari ({{koinari:size}})- It gains {{hit dice gained:companion:koinari}}d{{hit dice size:koinari}} hit dice. DC: {{koinari:dc}}. AC: +{{koinari:ac bonus}}. Radiant Strike: +{{koinari:attack:hit}} DMG: {{koinari:attack:dice}} + {{koinari:attack:damage}}

element.name: Ko-inari Improvement
element.source: Ryoko's Guide to the Yokai Realms

description.p: Whenever you gain a level beyond 1st in this class, each companion to which you are bonded gains one of the following improvements. Any newly gained companions receive these additional Hit Dice and improvements as if you had them since your 1st level in tamer.

sheet.description: The Ko-inari has the following Improvements:

element.name: Messenger I
element.source: Ryoko's Guide to the Yokai Realms

description.p: Type: Active (action)
The ko-inari can cast the message cantrip, requiring no material components. When targeting its tamer with the spell, the ko-inari also doesn’t require verbal or somatic components to cast it.

sheet.description: Can cast the message cantrip (no materials).

element.name: Divine Seal I
element.source: Ryoko's Guide to the Yokai Realms

description.p: Type: Active (bonus action)

As a bonus action, the ko-inari can use one of the following seals, inscribing it upon a creature within 5 feet of it. A creature can only bear one of the ko-inari’s seals on it at a time. If a new one is inscribed, the effects of the older one cease.

ul.li: Seal of Healing. The ko-inari can only adorn a willing creature with this seal. At the end of that creature’s next turn, it regains 7 (2d6) hit points.
Seal of Strength. The ko-inari can only adorn a willing creature with this seal. That creature is under the effects of the bless spell for 1 minute.

description.p: After the ko-inari uses a seal, it can’t use that seal again until its tamer finishes a long rest.

sheet.description: Within 5 ft with a seal. Healing: regains 7 (2d6) HP at the end of their next turn. Strength: Bless effect (1 min).

element.name: Growth I
element.source: Ryoko's Guide to the Yokai Realms

description.p: Type: Passive (companion)

The ko-inari’s size increases to Small, its Hit Die size increases to a d6 (its hit point maximum consequently increases by 1 for each of its Hit Dice), and the damage die of its Radiant Strike attack increases to a d6.

sheet.description: Size: Small. Hit Die: d6. Radiant Strike: 1d6.

element.name: Scout
element.source: Ryoko's Guide to the Yokai Realms

description.p: Type: Passive (companion)
The ko-inari gains proficiency in the Perception and Survival skills. In addition, its walking speed increases by 10 feet.

sheet.description: Prof in Perception and Survival. Walking speed increases by 10 feet.

element.name: Messenger II
element.source: Ryoko's Guide to the Yokai Realms

description.p: Type: Active (action)

The ko-inari can cast the comprehend languages, locate creature, and sending spells, requiring no material components. After it casts a spell in this way, it can’t cast any spell with the Messenger II improvement again until its tamer finishes a short or long rest.

sheet.description: Can cast comprehend languages, locate creature, and sending (no materials).

element.name: Multiattack
element.source: Ryoko's Guide to the Yokai Realms

description.p: Type: Active (action)
As an action, the ko-inari can make two attacks.

element.name: Shapeshifter
element.source: Ryoko's Guide to the Yokai Realms

description.p: Type: Active (action)

As an action, the ko-inari takes on the shape of a fox. When it does, its equipment melds into its form. While in fox form, the ko-inari can’t wield weapons or tools, it can't use its Divine Seal improvements, it can take the Dash action as a bonus action, it loses its Radiant Strike, and it gains the Radiant Bite attack.
Radiant Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: Dex + PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + Dex) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) radiant damage.
It otherwise retains all its game statistics. This transformation lasts for 1 hour or until the ko-inari reverts to its true form as an action or dies.

sheet.description: Transform into fox form (1 hour). Loses radiant strike. Gains: +5 ft, Bite: +{{koinari:bite:hit}}, DMG: {{koinari:bite:damage:dice}} + {{koinari:bite:damage}} + {{koinari:bite:damage:dice}} radiant

element.name: Divine Seal II
element.source: Ryoko's Guide to the Yokai Realms

description.p: Type: Active (bonus action)
The ko-inari learns two new seals to hinder its enemies with its Divine Seal I improvement:

ul.li: Seal of Disruption. A creature the ko-inari adorns with this seal must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have disadvantage on the first attack roll it makes on each of its turns for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Seal of Purification. A creature the ko-inari adorns with this seal must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or take 3 (1d6) radiant damage at the start of each of its turns for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

description.p: In addition, the ko-inari regains the use of all of its seals when its tamer finishes a short or long rest.

sheet.description: Learn Seal of Disruption and Seal of Purification. Regain all seals to use each Short Rest.

element.name: Growth II
element.source: Ryoko's Guide to the Yokai Realms

description.p: Type: Passive (companion)

The ko-inari’s size increases to Medium, its Hit Die size increases to a d8 (its hit point maximum consequently increases by 1 for each of its Hit Dice), the damage die of its Radiant Strike attack increases to a d8, and the damage dice of its Radiant Bite attack (see Shapeshifter improvement) both increase to a d8.

sheet.description: Size: Medium. Hit Die: d8. Radiant Strike/Bite damage: d8

element.name: Messenger III
element.source: Ryoko's Guide to the Yokai Realms

description.p: Type: Passive (companion), Active (action)
The ko-inari is always under the effects of the nondetection spell.

In addition, the ko-inari can cast the telepathic bond spell, requiring no material components. Creatures under the effect of this spell are immune to magic that allows other creatures to read their thoughts, determine whether they’re lying, know their alignment, or know their creature type.
After the ko-inari casts the spell in this way, it can’t do so again until its tamer finishes a long rest.

sheet.description: Under the effects of the nondetection spell. Casts telepathic bond spell (immune magic effects)

element.name: Divine Seal III
element.source: Ryoko's Guide to the Yokai Realms

description.p: Type: Active (bonus action)
When the ko-inari uses a seal as part of its Divine Seal I improvement, it can adorn one additional creature within 5 feet of it with that seal. In addition, the ko-inari learns two more seals:

ul.li: Seal of Protection. The ko-inari can only adorn a willing creature with this seal. That creature gains a +1 bonus to AC for 1 minute.
Seal of Weakness. A creature the ko-inari adorns with this seal must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have disadvantage on the next saving throw it makes within 1 minute.

sheet.description: Can adorn 1 additional creature within 5ft. Add Seal of Protection or Seal of Weakness

element.name: Speed Training
element.source: Ryoko's Guide to the Yokai Realms

description.p: Increase one existing speed by 15 feet up to a maximum of 150% of the creature’s base speed, rounded up to the nearest 5-foot increment.
E.g., a base speed of 30 feet can be increased to 45 feet maximum, a base speed of 25 feet can be increased to 40 feet, and a base speed of 20 feet to 30 feet.

sheet.description: Increase one existing speed by 15 feet (Max of 150%)

element.name: War Training
element.source: Ryoko's Guide to the Yokai Realms

description.p: Your companion gains proficiency with one armour type or two weapons.

p.i: Your companion can’t gain proficiency in medium and heavy armour until it has gained proficiency in the prerequisite lighter armour types. For example, to gain proficiency in heavy armour, you must take this improvement 3 times: light, then medium, then heavy. Work with your GM to figure out if and how a creature can wield shields and weapons.
